LanguageData.Ability_DetectChancePerEntropy.label: detection chance
LanguageData.Ability_DetectChancePerEntropy.descripti:
The likelihood of this psycast being detected when it is performed.

Some factions try to enforce laws which restrict some psycasts to those holding specific titles. When you use a psycast, there is a chance that the psychic signature will be detected at a distance, which leads to diplomatic consequences.

The chance of detection can be eliminated using a psychic silencer implant.
